Subjects: prayers, to saints; prayers, to guardian angel
_description: Prayer to angels, apostles, and martyrs — in quatrains

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Michel and seint GabrielAnd alle þe Angels also
                    wel…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Preyeþ for me to vre ladiÞat Ihesu of me haue
                    merci
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

Horstmann,  Carl,

             The Minor Poems of the Vernon Manuscript, Part 1.
EETS

CULDd1426.First Lines:
Seynte michaelle & seynte gabryelleAnd alle good aungels also
                    welle…
CULDd1426.Last Lines:
…[A]nd for þe quyke and for þe dede[a] pater noster
                    wythe Aue and a Crede

BLAdd37787.First Lines:
Seint michael & seint GabrielAnd al goode angeles alse
                    wel…
BLAdd37787.Last Lines:
…All haluen þat euer wereThat boteþ crist boþe
                    lef & dere. Pray ye for me

BLHar210.First Lines:
SEynt Miȝel & sint gabrielAnd alle goddes angelis also
                    welPreyet for me tu oure leuediÞat ihesu on me haue
                    merci…
BLHar210.Last Lines:
…Pater noster Alle halweyn þat euere wereWyþ ihesu
                    crist hore lef and derePater noster And in alle quike & dedePater
                    noster & a crede
BLHar210.Editions:
Baugh,  Nita Scudder. 
             A Worcestershire Miscellany, compiled by John
                    Northwood, c. 1400, edited from British Museum MS. Add.
                37,787.
         Philadelphia, 1956: 103-4.

                    ]…
EDU114.Last Lines: …[ ] for me with o[ ]Þat ihesu on me haue [ ]

Witten198.First Lines:
Seynt mygel and Gabriel & al þe gode anngelis also
                    wele…
